title: Case Histories
description: In #1 of series, Jackson Brodie PI follows three 30-years cold, unconnected Cambridge family cases:  1 A little girl disappears in the night.  2 A beautiful young office worker falls to a maniac's attack. 3 A new mother is overwhelmed by demands from her baby and husband - until a fit of rage creates a grisly, bloody escape.Result : Startling connections and discoveries emerge. . . .
author: Kate Atkinson
